item.title: 2026 McKinney Writing Contest is open!
item.description: The 2026 McKinney Writing Contest is open from November 1, 2025 through March 9, 2026. Submit in any or all of the following categories: Fiction, Creative Nonfiction, or Drama; Poetry; Academic Essay; Language & Image; or our NEW category: Writing for Games. Undergraduate and graduate divisions. First prize $300; 2nd prize $175; and 3rd prize $75. Submit: https://hass.rpi.edu/mckinney. Submit in fall for December graduates. Questions? McKinney@rpi.edu

item.title: CCPD & Naval Nuclear Laboratory Info Session
item.description: The Naval Nuclear Laboratory is the U.S. Navy’s trusted partner for superior propulsion technology, design, testing, training, and support. Join the CCPD and representatives from Naval Nuclear Laboratory VIRTUALLY on Tuesday, December 9th from 6-7pm to learn more about internships, co-ops, and full-time employment!

item.title: Red & White Winter Celebration | Dec. 6
item.description: Date: Saturday, December 6, 2025 2:00 AM - 3:00 AM - Voting on holiday trees decorated by clubs and fraternities. Winners announced by President Marty Schmidt! Vote for your favorite tree, enjoy games and refreshments, and pick up free swag at the ’86 Field!
item.author: Community

item.title: 2025 RPI Holiday Concert and Victorian Stroll Kickoff | Dec. 6
item.description: Saturday / December 6, 2025 at 7:00 pm Presented in partnership with the Rensselaer County Regional Chamber of Commerce, this free, family-friendly event invites you to celebrate the season with music, community, and festive refreshments. The concert will feature performances by the RPI Orchestra, Concert Choir, and Wind Symphony, including works by Smetana, Tchaikovsky, Gershwin, Lauridsen, and Saint-Saëns. Registration is required. Presented by School of HASS Performance

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Getting the Most Out of AI with Percipio”
item.description:
“Getting the Most Out of AI with Percipio” This workshop introduces you to Percipio’s AI Chat, AI Skill Benchmarks, and interactive AI scenarios. You’ll learn how to navigate AI Chat to explore ideas, ask questions, and get quick support. You’ll also be shown how to access and complete AI Skill Benchmarks and use guided scenarios to practice applying Percipio’s AI features.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
